pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1
Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: the name of various newspapers, notably Le Monde (France), El Mundo (Spain) and Die Welt (Germany)
great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
the teeming world/the world of sensual pleasures

sentences.english: Many disaster will happen every day in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在这个世界上，天天都邑发生很多灾难性的工作。

sentences.english: For instance, Christmas gifts and toys, they are exported around the world.
sentences.chinese: 例如，圣诞礼品和玩具，它们是出口世界各地。

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 过去的半个世纪内，美国一直是世界的面包篮子。

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道这个世界上有一种叫做双头白化蛇的生物吗？

sentences.english: The antagonism of moralities is an important factor to influence world harmony.
sentences.chinese: 道德的对立是影响世界和谐的重要因素。

sentences.english: I met a lot of friends, a lot of people from a lot around the world.
sentences.chinese: 我碰到很多朋友，很多人，他们来自世界各地。

sentences.english: The salesperson said it was a famous world brand.
sentences.chinese: 那个售货员说是世界名牌呢。

sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推动全世界的改装奔驰车。

sentences.english: China is transforming the world as it transforms itself.
sentences.chinese: 中国正在像转变自身那样来转变世界。

sentences.english: China has been no exception to the world-wide celebrity of Susan Boyle.
sentences.chinese: 世界名人苏姗波义耳对中国也不例外。

sentences.english: Lord, we are responsible for much of the suffering in this world.
sentences.chinese: 主啊，我们对世界上的苦难要付上大部分的责任。

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.
sentences.chinese: 现在最新的情报分析实时地向全世界公布。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界卫生日，我祝愿你们大家身心健康。

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人观看了在足球城体育场举行的世界杯决赛。

sentences.english: They want Beijing out of the World Trade Organization.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望中国脱离世界贸易组织。

definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
ranked number one in the world/the world's first
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
the Three Worlds (as proposed by Mao Zedong), i.e. the superpowers (USA and USSR), other wealthy countries (UK, France, Japan etc), and the developing countries of Asia, Africa and Latin America
